skillsSnapshot.prompt:
The following skills provide specialized instructions for specific tasks.
Use the read tool to load a skill's file when the task matches its description.

<available_skills>
  <skill>
    <name>prose</name>
    <description>OpenProse VM skill pack. Activate on any `prose` command, .prose files, or OpenProse mentions; orchestrates multi-agent workflows.</description>
    <location>/app/extensions/open-prose/skills/prose/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>bluebubbles</name>
    <description>Build or update the BlueBubbles external channel plugin for Moltbot (extension package, REST send/probe, webhook inbound).</description>
    <location>/app/skills/bluebubbles/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>contract-parser</name>
    <description>Extract structured data from legal contracts (PDF) - parties, values, dates, clauses</description>
    <location>/app/skills/contract-parser/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>github</name>
    <description>Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/github/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>gog</name>
    <description>Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/gog/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>gog-contacts</name>
    <description>Manage Google Contacts via gogcli - create, read, update contacts and access Workspace directory</description>
    <location>/app/skills/gog-contacts/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>invoice-generator</name>
    <description>Generate professional invoices from templates using wkhtmltopdf</description>
    <location>/app/skills/invoice-generator/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>mcporter</name>
    <description>Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/mcporter/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>meeting-notes</name>
    <description>Transcribe audio recordings and generate structured meeting notes with action items</description>
    <location>/app/skills/meeting-notes/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>nano-pdf</name>
    <description>Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/nano-pdf/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>openai-image-gen</name>
    <description>Batch-generate images via OpenAI Images API. Random prompt sampler + `index.html` gallery.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/openai-image-gen/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>openai-whisper-api</name>
    <description>Transcribe audio via OpenAI Audio Transcriptions API (Whisper).</description>
    <location>/app/skills/openai-whisper-api/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>oracle</name>
    <description>Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).</description>
    <location>/app/skills/oracle/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>remotion-dev</name>
    <description>Create videos programmatically using Remotion (React-based video framework). Best practices for composition, rendering, and deployment.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/remotion-dev/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>session-logs</name>
    <description>Search and analyze your own session logs (older/parent conversations) using jq.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/session-logs/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>skill-creator</name>
    <description>Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/skill-creator/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>summarize</name>
    <description>Summarize or extract text/transcripts from URLs, podcasts, and local files (great fallback for “transcribe this YouTube/video”).</description>
    <location>/app/skills/summarize/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>tmux</name>
    <description>Remote-control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/tmux/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>video-frames</name>
    <description>Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.</description>
    <location>/app/skills/video-frames/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
  <skill>
    <name>weather</name>
    <description>Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).</description>
    <location>/app/skills/weather/SKILL.md</location>
  </skill>
</available_skills>
